Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

addPair((uint256,address,address,bool,ui.details: Only operator can call this function.

params._addPairParam: parameters to define asset risk and interest rate model

addPairGroup(address,uint8).details: Only operator can call this function.

getVaultStatus(uint256).details: This function should not be called on chain.

getVaultStatusWithAddress(uint256).details: This function should not be called on chain.

params._closeRatio: If you'll close all position, set 1e18.
params._sqrtSlippageTolerance: if caller is liquidator, the caller can set custom slippage tolerance.

params._pairId: The id of pair to reallocate.

setLiquidator(address).details: Only operator can call this function.

setOperator(address).details: Only operator can call this function.

params._amount: The amount of asset being supplied
params._isStable: If true supplys to stable pool, if false supplys to underlying pool
params._pairId: The id of pair being supplied to the pool

returns.finalMintAmount: The amount of claim token being minted

returns._0: TradeResult The result of perp trade

updateAssetRiskParams(uint256,(uint256,i.details: The function can be called by pool owner.

params._changeToIsolatedMode: If true change the pair to isolated mode.
params._pairId: The id of asset to update params.

updateFeeRatio(uint256,uint8).details: The function can be called by pool owner.

params._pairId: The id of pair to update params.

updateIRMParams(uint256,(uint256,uint256.details: The function can be called by pool owner.

params._pairId: The id of pair to update params.

params._marginAmount: The amount of margin. Positive means deposit and negative means withdraw.

params._isolatedVaultId: The id of an isolated vault
params._marginAmount: The amount of margin. Positive means deposit and negative means withdraw.
params._moveFromMainVault: If true margin is moved from the main vault, if false the margin is transfered from the account.

updatePoolOwner(uint256,address).details: The function can be called by pool owner.

params._pairId: The id of pair to update params.

withdrawCreatorRevenue(uint256,bool).details: Only pool owner can call this function.

withdrawProtocolRevenue(uint256,bool).details: Only operator can call this function.

params._amount: The amount of asset being withdrawn
params._isStable: If true supplys to stable pool, if false supplys to underlying pool
params._pairId: The id of pair being withdrawn from the pool

returns.finalBurnAmount: The amount of claim token being burned
returns.finalWithdrawAmount: The amount of token being withdrawn

addPair((uint256,address,address,bool,ui.notice: Adds token pair to the contract

getSqrtPrice(uint256).notice: Gets square root of current underlying token price by quote token.

getVaultStatusWithAddress(uint256).notice: Gets latest main vault status that the caller has.

liquidationCall(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Executes liquidation call and gets reward. Anyone can call this function.

reallocate(uint256).notice: Reallocates range of Uniswap LP position.

supplyToken(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Supplys token and mints claim token

tradePerp(uint256,uint64,(int256,int256,.notice: Trades perps of x and sqrt(x)

updateMarginOfIsolated(uint64,uint256,in.notice: Deposit margin to the isolated vault or withdraw margin from the isolated vault.

withdrawToken(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Withdraws token and burns claim token

userdoc.notice: Error Codes C0: invalid asset rist parameters C1: caller must be operator C2: caller must be vault owner C3: token0 or token1 must be registered stable token C4: invalid interest rate model parameters C5: invalid vault creation C6: caller must be fee recipient
